channel.title: Seed Set on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Seed Set on funPlantGenes

item.title: BoPMEI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BoPMEI1 Gene Name: pectin methylesterase inhibitor Genome: Species: Brassica oleracea Functional Descriptions: BoPMEI1, a pollen-specific pectin methylesterase inhibitor, has an essential role in pollen tube growth.

item.title: CsCWIN3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa3G777580 Gene Symbol: CsCWIN3 Gene Name: Cell wall invertase 3 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Cell wall invertase 3 (CsCWIN3) plays critical roles in providing sugars during pollination and fertilization in cucumber CsCWIN3-RNA interference plants also showed affected seed development.

item.title: MS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.10G281800 Gene Symbol: MS2 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Natural variation of MS2 confers male fertility and drives hybrid breeding in soybean.

item.title: OsMKKK70
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g50410 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0699500 Gene Symbol: OsMKKK70 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: OsMLH1;PSSR1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g72880 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0958900 Gene Symbol: OsMLH1 PSSR1 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: OsNPK1-PK;OsMAPKKK62
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g50420 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0699600 Gene Symbol: OsNPK1-PK OsMAPKKK62 OsMKKK62 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: VvMybPA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VvMybPA1 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor PA1 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: A previous study has already identified VvMybPA1 as the first transcription factor involved in the regulation of the proanthocyanidin pathway during seed development in grapevine.
